name: Safari 9 for Firefox (Mac only)
description:
Styles Firefox to look like Safari 9 from OS X Yosemite and above. In addition to the basic Safari layout, many of the main icons and animations are reproduced using embedded SVG and CSS transitions. Additionally, under OS X 10.11+, the San Francisco typeface is used in more locations than stock Firefox. 

***This style was designed for Mac OS X users and currently does not work properly under Windows, Linux, etc***

Designed for Firefox 53.
additional_info:
2017-08-22 Update for Firefox 55 changes
2016-12-18 Updated "combined" urlbar icons
2016-12-10 Simplified/cleaned up the notification icons in the urlbar, other misc. tweaks+fixes
2016-11-27 URL bar drop-down styling
2016-07-14  
   * Fixed window dragging from space surrounding the URL bar (broken by Firefox 47). 
   * Modified icons for non-retina displays

discussions.name: The icons stretch sideways on external monitors over HDMI
Nice! Looks even better with mac vibrancy
